summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Music Genre Exploration and Quiz Bot focusing on quiz flow functionality. All backend quiz endpoints working correctly with Spotify+Deezer integration and MongoDB persistence. Frontend displays properly with working authentication flows and protected routes.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Quota exceeded (429 errors) for Gemini 2.0 Flash model
flaky_endpoints.workaround: App gracefully handles failures with fallback question generation

passed_tests: Backend API health check at /api/ returns 200 with correct status
Spotify OAuth URL endpoint /api/auth/spotify-login generates valid auth URLs
Successfully created test user in MongoDB with proper schema
Generated valid JWT tokens for authentication testing
Quiz start endpoint /api/quiz/start works for genre mode with 5 questions
Quiz start endpoint works for artist mode with track fetching
Quiz start endpoint works for mood mode with happy mood filtering
Spotify + Deezer integration provides audio previews for tracks
Auth/me endpoint returns correct user data with valid tokens
Landing page renders with correct title 'Music QuizBot' and deep ocean theme
Spotify 'Continue with Spotify' button functional and redirects to OAuth
Feature cards (Genre Guess, Artist Guess, Mood Quiz) display correctly
Protected routes /hub and /dashboard redirect to landing page without auth
Glass-styled UI components render properly with bioluminescent theme
No JavaScript errors detected in browser console
Responsive design works on mobile (390x844) and desktop (1920x1080)
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider upgrading Gemini API plan or implementing rate limiting to handle API quota limits. Current fallback question system works but AI-generated questions would enhance user experience.
